column3:
â€œI have 40+ years experience growing and using cannabis, a masters degree in agri/horticulture from MSU and will break each review down as follows from my own personal experience with seeds or clones obtained directly from the original breeders: 
-

Use; Sativa effects, happy, euphoric, relaxed, great for depression, anxiety, stress, motivation and daytime use. This is a very nice strain by Nirvana Seeds and their ver...â€

â€œAK-48 has helped me in so many ways with respect to my cancer. My appetite has resumed as normal, I sleep GREAT, less depression, moments of bliss, less pain and increased level of hope for survival. It is, without a doubt, my personal favorite, strongly recommended.â€
â€œAK48 has been a nice natural supplement to use in my cancer treatment. Gives you your life back with NO harsh side effects = PERFECTâ€

â€œthis strain was amazing, got an 1.5 oz, the high was a creeper but it was defiantly a couch lock after the third load into the bong. smoked a blunt with a friend, we got lost in the taco bell restroom, not for new smokers.â€

â€œfor AK48 i must say i like a lot..even tho she's not my typical type of medicine..because i'm using mostly cbd strains...but Ak48 has nice effect-relaxing and smooth..it's great social strain..great for weekend mornings -like today :D ...can have amazingly nice smell and aroma ...and it's easy for growing..like..one of easiest strains ..and it looks really nice vigorous growth..nice lime green..refreshing look and sm...â€
â€œMakes me happy to be alone. I don't seem to need company. I become introspective.â€
â€œThis is a crazy strain! Strong visuals, complex and creative thinking. Newbies be careful, you might overreact to the effects.â€
â€œWas able to obtain a Jar of this beautiful Medicine. Fantastic soaring Euphoria,  as the CBN quality of this Strain hits your Opiate Reseptors. A must.â€

â€œI'm huge on sativa. When I want to smoke, I want something that will make me get up and want to do something, whether it be hike up a mountain and enjoy the view, chill out on a pier at the beach at night and trip out on the lights on the water and the stars in the sky with some good friends, or just watch a movie. I enjoy good weed be it indica or sativa don't get me wrong, but I don't want to feel sleepy if I'm try...â€

â€œExcellent strain! Very smooth smoke, i felt like my problems and stress was fading away with every puff. Its not a downer, its more of an uplifter. Makes you feel like doing things rather then couchlocking. Grew it myself so maybe the results arent similar to others. Overall very strong plant and great bud formation.â€

â€œWhen grown to its full potential its up their with my favorites first smoke smelled of that old gum with the fuckin zebra on it. The potent hue of fruit is its signature perfection in my opinion high sativa feel with good pain releif, most notable is help with gastrointestinal disorders.â€
â€œNice clear-headed high. It's like being high without being high. But kind of also not really. Wow that doesn't make a ton of sense eh? That high.â€
â€œThis  is  a very  good  medication. Don't  need  much.â€

â€œAK-48 Is the best weed I've ever had. All my physical pain is changed into a tingly feeling that feels great. It is so euphoric I swear my friends and I were running and skipping and it felt line we were jumping on the moon. It makes you excited to get up and do something because it'll feel so good. Also lastly makes all your worries go away you won't care about them. Ak-48 is so amazing I highly recommend it.â€
â€œMakes your day perfect.â€

â€œAK-48 helped me to eat when I was nauseate at the very thought of food.
It has a wonderful earthy, uplifting taste that keeps me coming back for more.
The particular strain I have has a cherry phenome which adds to it's appeal.â€

â€œGrew from seed, hydro using General Hydroponics 3-part with amendments like Earth Juice/compost tea/sweetener to finish.  Was very pleased with the outcome.  Recommend this strain for pain and stress.â€
â€œVery euphoric and enjoyable, almost trippy. My vision even seemed affected at points. Surprisingly pain relieving for a sativa heavy hybrid. Pure bliss, a new favorite.â€

â€œvery nice strain. one must be careful WHO you purchase from. there ARE a few imposters out there and by the time you get to try it, it's too late.
My suggestion if you are in Michigan, go check out the Karmacy. i have no connection with them at all other than i've been there and will never go any place else. the AK-48 i got here was TOP of the line.
As were ALL of the flowers i bought.  watch out on the concentrate...â€
â€œThis helped me a lot! I have horrible anxiety and this definitely put me in the mood to chill the f**k out. thank you cannagods.â€
â€œExcellent therapeutic and natural supplement for anyone with a serious illness and everything that goes along with it. Helps get your life back.â€

â€œSolid high. Smoked bowl, ripped bongs, rolled papers... shit is dank. I have back problems so it eases pain and all that such. Good solid functional high from them. Probably the best i've smoked..â€

â€œVery good strain, when i got it this shit looked fantastic.
it had this fruity scent i couldn't quite put my finger on.
we smoked it and the uplifting high was instant, idk if it was just grown to perfect quality or what but this is easily one of my favorite strains.
then as i was rolling a doobie i kept getting that smell and i'm like what the fuck? then i smell the joint once its rolled and i'm like...
O My Go...â€"

â€œExceptional ğŸ¤— I'm dealing with a lot of post op knee pain & was pleasantly surprised to find that this strain helps with the discomfort as well as the anxiety & depression that comes with recuperation. The buds are beautiful & covered in trichomes & the high is very energizing & uplifting too. I've got a smile plastered on my face for the first time in months .Only smoked the dried herb so far . ğŸğŸ”¥Ready to vape ne...â€

When smoking this particular strain you will confront a monster, a bloated, disastrous monster that devours every thing you try to use against it. Pizza, macâ€™nâ€™cheese, nachos... any thing, nothing even seems to affect it. If...â€

we smoked it and the uplifting high was instant, idk if it was just grown to perfect quality or what but this is easily one of my favorite strains.
then as i was rolling a doobie i kept getting that smell and i'm like what the fuck? then i smell the joint once its rolled and i'm like...

â€œI recently smoke AK and found it very smooth to pull on through my bong and quite sticky to smoke in a joint. I enjoyed this strain a lot as it was a smooth enjoyable high. It relieved me of my head aches and tummy pains that i have been suffering from all week. This strain is one of my favourites as it gives you a nice buzz. Although you do get a little sleepy and a bit deflated afterwards when you are coming down.â€
â€œamazingâ€

â€œAfter not smoking for two weeks I took two hits of AK-48 out of my buddies bowl. Those two hits last a long time. A very pleasant high. Not overpowering, but not too weak either. Made me play guitar for a little bit, listen to music, then open up a bag of Doritos and watch Scrubs. But absolutely NO couch-lock. You don't walk around on this shit, you fly around.â€

â€œlimbs are hot. lol. its a halo crate. i feel like i could work out though. but im definitely sufficiently baked. like, severely baked. my friends rolling a spliff right next to me haha. this is crazy. aah!. lol just kidding its cool. wow. alright people who smoke weed. enjoy this strain. but be caresful, im tired as fuckâ€

â€œlimbs are hot. lol. its a halo crate. i feel like i could work out though. but im definitely sufficiently baked. like, severely baked. my friends rolling a spliff right next to me haha. this is crazy. aah!. lol just kidding its cool. wow. alright people who smoke weed. enjoy this strain. but be caresful, im tired as fuckâ€

High was Indica feeling to me but didn't last long. If I remember correctly it was lime green and pungent with avg dense nugs and a small yield (I may have only vegged them 2 weeks though) I'd try it again if I came across it and noth...â€

â€œVery relaxing without being overwhelming.  Great for bedtime ritual to help fall asleeo.â€
â€œHad some first thing after work and it hit hard and fast. Good flavor.â€
â€œSome damn fine top shelf smoke for the Washington recreational market.â€
â€œThis strain both looks and smells great. Definitely more of a sativa, it is still a very enjoyable strain.â€

â€œI grew this strain. i absolutely love the sweet citrus smell of the bud. The taste is early/pine. The first time I tried it was with 1 bowl and it was alright. The 2nd time, I smoked 2 bowls, back to back, and I was higher than high. Overall. I like it a lot, will grow again.â€
â€œBud had a yellow-greenish color with orange hairs. Making it unique with all color. Overall worth a few grams of try. taste was niceâ€
â€œThis strain gives very good high and the bud smells gooodâ€
â€œVery good strain. Definitely helpednfor stress. I would not reccomend it as pain medication though. No effect pain wise for meâ€

â€œThis hybrid is amazing. The last times I have grown her, I used a 400 watt metal halide with fluorescents along the sides. She grew wonderfully, producing a large amount of bud. The high is a perfect blend of sativa and indica with her leaning towards sativa effects. I am growing a couple right now with 1000 watts LED on the side and a 6 lamp T8 fluorescent on top this time. I hope they turn out even close to what th...â€
â€œNot really fan of it as it dosent give me really anything. But its decent.â€

â€œWow !! ğŸ‘ŒğŸ½Just got a sample of Ak-48  from chronickkushco.ca and itâ€™s simply amazing. I love how they offer u a sample of a strain, you had your eye on to try in your bag. My next order will be oz of this fire ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ hit them up chronickushco.ca you wonâ€™t be disappointed !â€
â€œI love ak strains aâ€
â€œNice and crystally, smells awesome, would buy it againâ€

â€œThe nugs smell like grape which turns to citrus upon breaking. The body relaxes as the mind engages. Couldn't sleep on this as my mind was racing but it's good for just chilling. If you need physical relief without crashing, I imagine this is a good fit.â€

â€œFrom seed/soil.  Totally relaxed bake.  Vape was much more uplifting, smoke was much more stoned, but in a good way when you want that.  AK-48 over a 6 month period really helped me to work out some major stuff.  I'm grateful to Nirvana.

It should have been flushed more, but had a pretty clean citrus taste with quite a bit of earthy taste.  Very little smell to this strain.  None if sealed even a little.â€
â€œGood stuff to take a rest after a hard day.â€
â€œgot a nice highâ€

â€œI give this a strain 4 stars based off of its classic lineage and it's incredibly fast and robust growth patterns. This fuckers fast. It's sweet, earthy, slightly pungent and not too special in the scent pallet department, it also tastes about the same. The high can be relatively strong and rather stony.â€
â€œNot a strong hight, helped me to concetrate a lot!!! I got very focused.â€

â€œVery relaxing.not too much of a physical high but the mental chatter will cease. Simply put I felt more comfortable to be myself. Less inhibited. The aroma was inviting. I can see how this can cause anxiousness in new smokers so if new take in moderation. I will definitely be buying seconds.ğŸcheersâ€
â€œVery strong. Definitely leans a bit too sativa for me. Iâ€™m definitely more of an indica fan.â€
â€œBud had a yellow-greenish color with orange hairs. Making it unique with all color. Overall worth a few grams of try. taste was niceâ€
â€œGreat taste, smell, color and beautiful smoke.â€
â€œhas a sutle sweet musky aroma and a light musky, pepper taste. the high is very invigorating and a lil uplifting and hits immediately. great day time Stress Strainâ€
â€œI love ak strains aâ€

â€œI grew AK48 from Nirvana and I love this strain! I can see why it's so popular. Very euphoric, relaxed, happy, can get the giggles. Good all around sativa full body high. I can use this during the day and before bed. 

- My medical diagnosis are: bipolar but depression is my main symptom, anxiety (GAD and panic disorder), insomnia, cervical spinal stenosis, 2 herniated discs, daily cervical migraines, shoulder injury...â€
â€œthis is a beautiful strain iv had this strain alot and never really had a problem love the smell its got a beautiful smelli recommend itâ€

â€œAK-47 is a reminiscent of bud I always dreamed of having as a teenager so this was mainly the reason why I grabbed some. The buds are super dense with an almost yellow green tinge, it has bright orange hairs everywhere. Very earthy taste. Effects are uplifting and energetic, able to be productive and get things done without being couch-locked. Nothing super special or to rave about though IMO. Pretty strong hybrid bu...â€
â€œNo effect at all.â€

â€œUnlike strains like Bubblegum that are really psychedelic, AK48's high felt very down-to-earth and grounded. It was a good energy, happy sensation, but still feeling in control and not couch-locked. I would recommend anyone who can't take the psychedelic stuff.â€

â€œI had no interest in this strain. I forgot to specify which strain I wanted from my delivery service, and I ended up with AK48. I was very pleasantly surprised. Fantastic bag appeal and fruity smell. The high was a good hybrid mixture. Heady at onset, which evolved into a nice body buzz.â€

It should have been flushed more, but had a pretty clean citrus taste with quite a bit of earthy taste.  Very little smell to this strain.  None if sealed even a little.â€

â€œThis is a mellow strain. I made the dopest mix. I put AK-48, Green Crack, Lemon Jack and Girl Scout Cookies in an electric grinder with a few quick pulses and what came out was a masterpiece of flavor, effect, euphoria and smell. The overall experience is amazing.â€

ouldnt change much abt it.â€

It is advertised as 7-9 week plant and i am at 6 weeks and this plant is completely done with amber hairs and trichomes alrea...â€
